Benjamin Noble

Web Developer In Training • Harrisburg, PA

About Me: "Welcome to my portfolio! I am a web developer with a passion for helping individuals and businesses build their online presence. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, I work closely with each client to create a custom website that reflects their unique brand and vision. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to update your existing site, I am here to help you reach your goals and grow your business. With a keen eye for design, I am able to not only build a website that functions seamlessly, but also one that looks beautiful and captures the essence of your brand. My process is simple: I listen to your needs, gather your requirements, and develop a comprehensive plan for your website. From there, I work closely with you every step of the way, using the latest technologies and design techniques to bring your vision to life. I believe that a great website should not only look amazing but also be user-friendly and optimized for search engines. If you're ready to take your online presence to the next level, I'd love to work with you! Please take a moment to browse my portfolio and get in touch to discuss your project. I look forward to the opportunity to help you build a website that you can be proud of."

I currently have working knowledge in: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Git version control and experience building an Ecommerce business.
